message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $11,500. I think it would be a valuable addition to your inventory and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I can't go as low as $10,500. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'm willing to go to $10,750. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
